synopsis.text:
Akari Sakura's mundane life takes an extraordinary turn when she encounters Ruby, a magical creature from Jewel Land, on her way to school. Jewel Land is a realm where enchanting creatures, known as Jewelpets, live in harmony with witches, honing their magical skills at a prestigious magic academy. Ruby, a white Japanese Hare with jewel eyes, struggles with her magical abilities and is sent to the human world to find a partner.

After an initial language barrier, Akari and Ruby form a unique bond, marked by the appearance of a Jewel Charm on Akari's hand, signifying their partnership. Together, they embark on a journey to compete in the Jewel Star Grand Prix, a magical tournament where the winners are granted any wish they desire. Despite Ruby's occasional magical mishaps, the duo remains hopeful, determined to triumph against all odds. Will they emerge victorious, or will their magical adventure culminate in chaos? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
